The video was originally posted on Faceb: 2019, and has been viewed over 813,000 times and shared over 27,000 times.
The video shows a man with crazed eyes m: 3. The claim made in the post's Indonesian language title translates to English as "Oh God... please play less games if possible stop it altogether don't become like this... it's your own risk."
The creator of the video: Raven Anandio, confirmed on his Instagram page that he originally created the clip as a satire of a video game addict.
